items.name: Ambient mana
items.description: If there's ambient mana around Sofia, if there isn't the mana recovery gets reduced to 25%

items.name: Ritual of Sun TODO: fix name
items.description: Ritual Sofia has learned that increases the mana regeneration speed by 200%

items.name: [Holy Skeleton]
items.description:
Allows the Saintomancer to control a ritually created Holy Skeleton wielding the Holy Light of gods. The Holy Skeleton will keep experience when switching bones. Physical and magical capabilities are influenced by the current bones.

Lv.1 : The Saintomancer always knows where their Holy Skeleton is.
Lv.10 : The Holy Skeleton boasts a glorious [Halo] empowering Holy related skills.
Lv.20 : The Holy Skeleton can create and wield a sword of Holy light. Proficiency depends on the host bones.
Lv.30 : Pareth’s bones are (1*Skill Level) denser.
Lv.40 : Pareth’s movements are (1*Skill Level) quieter.
Lv.50 : Pareth can cast [Consecrated grounds], granting all allies in a (skill level / 2) radius and himself a 20% increase in all physical stats. Bonus doubled for skeletons.

items.name: [Heal Undead]
items.description:
Invokes a pillar of Holy healing light. Only heals the undead.
Max range of (1*Skill Level) meter.
Heal the undead for (10+Skill level) Health per second while the light is channeled.
The light pillar’s upkeep is (100 * pillar's meters width * pillar's meters width) mana per second.
Does not work in restricted spaces.

items.name: [Summon blood]
items.description: Summons liquid human blood anywhere in a (1*Skill Level) meters radius from the Saintomancer (Must be free space). The quantity of blood summoned this way is : (1*Skill Level*Mana Spent) Milliliters.

items.name: [Lead the Dead]
items.description:
The Saintomancer is the saint of the dead.
Nearby undead are more likely to be neutral towards the Saintomancer.The Saintomancer may spend mana to influence nearby undead. The cost and efficacy will vary depending on the intelligence and level of the undead as well as the kind of influence being exerted.

items.name: [Angel’s bolt]
items.description:
Call forth the divine lightning bolt of Angel Acromegon to strike down foes.
May only be cast while airborne.
Costs 10000 mana per use.

items.name: [Maiden Banshee]
items.description:
Allows the Saintomancer to summon and host a Maiden Banshee.
Summoning the Maiden Banshee will lock 10 000 mana out of the summoner’s mana pool for as long as the Maiden Banshee is alive.
The Maiden Banshee shares the level of the summoner.
The Maiden Banshee is attributed the special class : Lady-in-waiting, and may not change class.
Should the Maiden Banshee die, she may be revived for the accumulated cost of 100 000 000 mana.

items.name: [Blessing of Deep]
items.description:
The Saintomancer was granted a name.
They may see the inhabitants of the Deep.
Lv.1 : The Saintomancer and their summons are immune to the [Mind control], [Hypnosis], [Confusion], [Insanity] and [Instant Death] status effects.

items.name: [Armor of Bones]
items.description: Gather and reform bones to create a blessed bone armor protecting the Saintomancer. The armor can store up to (100*Skill level) of bones to repair itself in combat. Protective strength goes up every level.

items.name: [Pristine Essence]
items.description: You are the unblemished. Immunity to memory alterations. Augmented resistance to perception alterations.

items.name: [Avatar of death]
items.description:
Grow to become the embodiment of death in this realm.
You may reap the souls of the recently passed, all is equal in death.
You may reap the souls of the recently passed, all is equal in death.

items.name: [Menial chores]
items.description: Stamina consumption of all non battle actions is reduced by (1*Skill Level).

items.name: [Fast reading]

items.name: [Shenanigans]
items.description: Analytical thinking is (1*Skill level) more efficient when used for personal gains.

items.name: [Way of the Fool]
items.description: Analytical thinking is (1*Skill level + 50) more efficient when used for personal gain. The Fool always stumbles but never falls. Gain extra experience from performing kills with trickery and deceit.

items.name: [Poker Face]
items.description: Keeping a straight face in all situations is (2*Skill level) easier.
